recommendations.title: Adjust Savings Rate
recommendations.description: Increase savings rate by 5% to compensate for missed savings targets in previous months.
recommendations.reasoning: Based on the user's discipline result, they have consistently missed savings targets. To get back on track, increasing the savings rate will help bridge the gap.

recommendations.title: Diversify Investments
recommendations.description: Rebalance investment portfolio to reduce risk and increase potential returns.
recommendations.reasoning: The user's behavior result indicates a high-risk investment strategy. Diversifying investments will help mitigate potential losses and optimize returns.

recommendations.title: Reduce Discretionary Spending
recommendations.description: Cut back on discretionary spending by 10% to allocate more funds towards savings and debt repayment.
recommendations.reasoning: The user's cashflow result shows a high percentage of income spent on discretionary items. Reducing this spending will free up more funds for savings and debt repayment.
